author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Oil and Gas Conservation Fortnight OGCF-2016 was launched by Bharat Petroleum Corporation Ltd., Coimbatore, LPG Territory at its LPG Bottling Plant, in Peelamedu, on Sunday. Theme for the observance is “Clean Fuels”. It started with a pledge to conserve fuels.

Territory Manager of the LPG Unit, Pradeep Nair, said that during the drive they would create awareness on oil and gas conservation, as it is the need of the hour due to the fast depleting non-renewable sources. Interested housing societies or educational institutions can contact territory office at 0422 – 2534336, 9442631963, 9940977001 or 9894128610 to arrange conservation related awareness programmes. About the ‘Give it Up Movement’, said that around 62,000 Bharat Gas consumers of Coimbatore region have given up LPG subsidy.
title: Focus on oil and gas conservation
